name: Tekton
description:
After many years of peace, humans were seized by the madness that the terrible Mundus had spread, and the whole land was plunged into war.

Fearing that humans would go extinct, Tekton, the only one who didn't become corrupted, began writing books and spreading them around the world, teaching people to fend for themselves and not fall into Mundus' temptation.

Trying to prevent Peace, the Dragon Mundus sent more troops to destroy Tekton's books and put a stop to his plans, and Tekton abandoned his ordinary life and began to fight for the good of strangers.

Discover the Story of the Silent Writer!

How to play

- Defeat your Enemies!
- Collect books to advance the story!
- Use your Skills and improve them to your advantage!
- Play in Valley of Dry Bones, Desert, City, Hell and many other fantastic places!
- Have fun and learn the story of Tekton, who fights to bring peace to the human race!


Resources

This challenging and original game will have you having fun like never before! Battle, explore, fight, kill Demons, Dragons and have fun!
